subject: Investing
title: The Death of the 60/40 Portfolio?
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Death of the 60/40 Portfolio?.

hook.text: In 2022, headlines declared the 60/40 portfolio dead. Stocks and bonds fell together for the first time in decades.

buildup.text: The 60/40 works because stocks and bonds usually move in opposite directions. Inflation broke that relationship.

discovery.text: Historically, stocks and bonds correlate negatively in low-inflation environments but positively when inflation spikes.

twist.text: The 60/40 has 'died' before â€” in the 1970s. It came back. Premature obituaries are a Wall Street tradition.

climax.text: Alternatives like real assets and commodities can fill the gap. But complexity has its own costs.

punchline.text: The 60/40 isn't dead. It just reminded everyone it's not invincible.

quiz.question: Why did the 60/40 portfolio struggle in 2022?
options: Stocks and bonds both fell due to high inflation
